files.description: Defines the cli_tool package version and exports the canonical public entrypoints used by the runner and CLI.
Implements the single canonical Typer-based CLI entrypoint with flags for risk thresholds and claim decomposition toggling and dispatches runs to the unified runner.
Implements the single canonical runner that creates one deterministic build directory under runtime/_build/, executes the pipeline, and coordinates structured artifact emission.
Provides structured artifact writers for logs, run manifest, and decision traces with stable schemas and deterministic file naming in runtime/_build/.
Enforces deterministic constraint checks and run reproducibility by normalizing environment inputs, seeding, hashing configs, and validating invariants preflight.
Defines Pydantic models (or lightweight dataclasses) for run manifest, decision trace events, and risk threshold configuration to ensure structured outputs.
Implements risk-threshold evaluation and reporting utilities used by goal_10/goal_12 sweeps and recorded into the decision trace and manifest.
Implements optional claim decomposition logic with a CLI toggle and emits decomposition steps into the decision trace for sweep comparability.
End-to-end tests that invoke the CLI to ensure a single build directory is created and that logs, manifest, and decision traces are written deterministically to runtime/_build/ with the new flags.
Unit tests for deterministic constraint checks including stable run_id generation, config hashing, and invariant validation failure modes.
Documents the canonical runner usage, artifact layout under runtime/_build/, deterministic guarantees, and CLI flags for risk thresholds and claim decomposition to support goal_10/goal_12 sweeps.
Defines the build metadata and console script entrypoint wiring the single canonical runner CLI, plus dependencies for Typer and structured output modeling.

missionDescription: Finalize a single canonical runner (one entrypoint, one build directory) that writes structured outputs (logs, run manifest, decision traces) to runtime/_build/ and enforces deterministic constraint checks; add CLI flags for risk thresholds and toggling claim decomposition to support goal_10/goal_12 sweeps.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
